price: ߊ߲ ߕߘߍ߬ ߊ߬ ߡߊߞߟߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߢߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߤߌߣߟߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
